name: Huskynaut
description:
I'm a first year game programming student at South-Eastern Finland University of Applied Sciences and recently did my first prototype with Unity. I know the game has some bugs that need to be fixed but still decided to share it with everyone. I am planning to do some fixing and expanding and I would appreciate your feedback and maybe some tips too, thank you!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can play on browser and I recommend to turn it on fullscreen, but there is also an option for downloading the game for windows.

Use w/s or up/down to move and space to shoot

To win the game, you have to get 5000 points.
